front.title: Questions Arising Concerning In-Person Meeting Cancellation

abstract.t: The COVID-19 pandemic has required the IETF community to confront complicated questions about the cancellation and replacement of in- person meetings. This document lists some general questions that have come up for discussion in the community as the IESG, the IRTF Chair, and the IETF LLC have been faced with making decisions about IETF 107 and IETF 108.
